00072 typedef struct ViewDepths {
00073     unsigned short w, h;
00074     short x, y; /* only for temp use for sub-rects, added to ar->winx/y */
00075     float *depths;
00076     double depth_range[2];
00077     
00078     char damaged;
00079 } ViewDepths;
00080 
00081 /* enum for passing to foreach functions to test RV3D_CLIPPING */
00082 typedef enum eV3DClipTest {
00083     V3D_CLIP_TEST_OFF =            0, /* clipping is off */
00084     V3D_CLIP_TEST_RV3D_CLIPPING =  1, /* clip single points */
00085     V3D_CLIP_TEST_REGION =         2  /* use for edges to check if both verts are in the view, but not RV3D_CLIPPING */
00086 } eV3DClipTest;
